@jillkrasny Hi,  I am on the board of Skybox, so thanks for the article.  I am also on the board of Liquid Robotics - even more audacious!
My wife Debra and I have greatly appreciated the entrepreneurial opportunities in our lives. It our privilege to endow the new NYU eLab!!!

Silicon Valley - the Streets are lined with gold. See NYTimes article http://t.co/t29bfvZPSG
happy holidays to all!
A perfect day in NYC.  going to the NY Philharmonic for 4th of July concert this afternoon -- a dose of patriotism.
the Iran thing is very interesting.  wonder how it will turn out.
will wait until next year to give the Palm Pre a serious look.  in the meantime will stick w/ my iPhone.
very moved by the Obama speech this morning!
"weekended in the Hamptons", but back in NYC.
off to Napa tomorrow.  totally great place.
Guest teaching the Veritas case at Stanford this morning.  Need to prepare!!!
Contrarian News:  it is a great time to start a company.  there are more really good ideas around now than i have seen in years!
i have started work on developing a new course at Stanford.  i am pretty stoked about it.
off to a day with my wife.  nice to have the time for this.
Cozy in NYC, with the rain outside.  Nice to have some alone time.  heading out to CA tomorrow AM.
back in NYC.  What a relief!  Fabulous weather -- will walk 5-7 miles today.  The city will be a celebration today.
Left NYC this AM.  in Albany.  What am i doing???
i am a newbie.  Learning about twitter.
